It follows the friendship of the beloved trio, Carrie, Charlotte, and Miranda, as they navigate their 50s […] The post And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.

excerpt: Curious about the release date and time of And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5? Here are all the details.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5 release date and time are right around the corner. And Just Like That… serves as a revival series and sequel to the popular HBO comedy-drama Sex and the City. It follows the friendship of the beloved trio, Carrie, Charlotte, and Miranda, as they navigate their 50s amidst the familiar chaos of the big city. The show brings back Sarah Jessica Parker, Cynthia Nixon, and Kristin Davis as the leading stars. The previous episode showcased Carrie deciding to stay in Virginia and Miranda taking on Hoy’s suggestion. The story will move further in the upcoming episode. So, here are all the release details of the show’s upcoming episode. When is the And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5 release date & time? The episode’s release date is Thursday, June 26, 2025, and its release time is 6:00 p.m. PT and 9:00 p.m. ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeJune 26, 20259:00 p.m.Pacific TimeJune 26, 20256:00 p.m. Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in And Just Like That… Season 3 right here. Where to watch And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5 You can watch And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5 via Max. Max, also known as HBO Max, hosts an extensive library of global hit shows such as The Last of Us, The Penguin, The White Lotus, and more. Since Max does not offer a free trial, fans will have to tune in via a subscription plan. What is And Just Like That… about? The official synopsis for And Just Like That… is as follows: “This new chapter of “Sex and the City” follows Carrie, Miranda and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.”
html:
The And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5 release date and time are right around the corner.

And Just Like That… serves as a revival series and sequel to the popular HBO comedy-drama Sex and the City. It follows the friendship of the beloved trio, Carrie, Charlotte, and Miranda, as they navigate their 50s amidst the familiar chaos of the big city. The show brings back Sarah Jessica Parker, Cynthia Nixon, and Kristin Davis as the leading stars. The previous episode showcased Carrie deciding to stay in Virginia and Miranda taking on Hoy’s suggestion. The story will move further in the upcoming episode.

So, here are all the release details of the show’s upcoming episode.

When is the And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is Thursday, June 26, 2025, and its release time is 6:00 p.m. PT and 9:00 p.m. ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in And Just Like That… Season 3 right here.

Where to watch And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5

You can watch And Just Like That… Season 3 Episode 5 via Max.

Max, also known as HBO Max, hosts an extensive library of global hit shows such as The Last of Us, The Penguin, The White Lotus, and more. Since Max does not offer a free trial, fans will have to tune in via a subscription plan.

What is And Just Like That… about?

The official synopsis for And Just Like That… is as follows:

“This new chapter of “Sex and the City” follows Carrie, Miranda and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.”
